tutorial.speak:
To keep attendance, go to the Chums dashboard.
Choose People.
Click on Attendance.
By default, you will open the Setup page.
Choose the plus in the top right corner to begin setting up your attendance.
Add a campus, where the class will take place.
We'll set this class in the Education Wing.
Be sure to save.
Add a service; this could be any day or name you choose.
We'll call this service Wednesday Night.
Be sure to save.
The last step is to add a time.
This class will take place Wednesday night at 7:00.
Once again, make sure you save your work.
You can now see this class will be in the Education Wing, Wednesday night at 7:00 p.m.
Now navigate to Groups.
Choose any group that will be meeting Wednesday night at 7:00 in the Education Wing.
We will look at the K-3rd grade class. Make sure the "track attendance" field says "yes." If it says "no," click the edit pencil and.
Change "track attendance" to "yes" and choose the "Add service time."
Choose the time of the service you will be tracking attendance for.
Add that service time.
Save your work.
Now let's record the attendance for the meeting we just set up. Click on Sessions.
Click "New" to add a new session.
Choose the service time.
And session date.
You can choose a past date to record the attendance of a class that has already taken place or a future date so it will be available when you are ready to record the attendance for that session.
Don't forget to save.
You will see the group members on the right side of the page.
Add members who were at the class session that day.
You can download a CSV of the attendance.
The CSV can be opened as an Excel or Numbers document.
